text: Xenoblade Chronicles is a 2010 role-playing game developed by Monolith-Soft, and published by Nintendo. ==Notes== Category:2010 video games Category:Action role-playing video games Category:Japanese role-playing video games Category:Nintendo 3DS eShop games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Nintendo video games Category:Open-world video games Category:Role- playing video games Category:Science fiction video games Category:Single- player video games Category:Video games about revenge Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Wii games
title: Xenoblade Chronicles (video game)
